name: Özgür Ulusoy
content: Özgür Ulusoy's Home Page Özgür Ulusoy Professor of Computer Engineering Bilkent University Biography Professor at Bilkent University since 2003 Associate Professor at Bilkent University, 1998 - 2003 Assistant Professor at Bilkent University, 1993 - 1998 Ph.D. in Computer Science, University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign, 1992 M.S. in Computer Engineering , Bilkent University, 1988 B.S. in Computer Engineering, Middle East Technical University, 1986 Teaching Courses Senior Projects Supervised for the 2025-2026 Academic Year CS490 Research Projects Supervised for the 2025-2026 Academic Year Research Current Research Interests (Summary of Research) Web search engines (Web Databases Research Group) Text-to-SQL systems (Text-to-SQL Research Group) Online social network analysis (Social Network Analysis Research Group) Multimedia database systems (Multimedia Databases Research Group) Wireless networks and mobile systems · Publications ( Another list from the Bibliography Server by Michael Ley @ University of Trier, Germany) · Citations to my work · Sponsored Projects · Theses Supervised · Awards Özgür Ulusoy Department of Computer Engineering Bilkent University, Bilkent, Ankara 06800, TURKEY e-mail: oulusoy at cs.bilkent.edu.tr
